overview:
Chris is the CEO and founder of Publicate.

Before taking the plunge and starting his new venture he was responsible for intentional business strategy and development for a large technology manufacturer, working out of Taiwan and the Netherlands.

Chris has lived and worked in many countries and is experienced in markets such as North America, EMEA, South Asia, Korea and Taiwan. During his time in Taiwan Chris studied Mandarin Chinese and achieved a basic level in both written and spoken.

He received his BSc from the University of Liverpool, where he played first team rugby league and was awarded second place in the University Entrepreneurial Presentation.
